title: T-Minus 23 Days: Progress ahoy!
body:
After not getting a chance to visit our new space yesterday, I was pleasantly surprised to see the sheetrock crews in full swing this afternoon. Apparently they're not waiting on the sprinkler install any longer. Both auditoriums are nearly 100% sheetrocked, the bathrooms are starting to take shape, and all that lacks on the electrical work is installing switches and outlets. It's a good day indeed.

In hopes of repenting for my missed post yesterday, I filmed a few shots of the new place today to give everyone a better idea of where we're at. Check it out:

<object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/WJj0w_NccwA&hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/WJj0w_NccwA&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" width="425" height="344"></embed></object>

And that's it for me today. I'll be back tomorrow with more info regarding our sound equipment and chairs.
author: Dan

comments.author: dan
comments.body: That's what she said... and by "she," I mean my mom... when I showed her the projection booth.
